pkgmetadata.longdescription:
[![](https://img.shields.io/pypi/v/pgrep.svg?maxAge=3600)](https://pypi.org/project/pgrep/)[![](https://img.shields.io/badge/License-Unlicense-blue.svg?longCache=True)](https://unlicense.org/)### Installation```bash$ [sudo] pip install pgrep```#### Examples```python>>> import pgrep>>> pgrep.pgrep("Finder")[322]>>> pgrep.pgrep("bash")[416, 434, 30681, 30918]>>> pgrep.pgrep("not-existing-process")[]```
